PROJECT_DETAILS: Here are a few projects I've been working on recently. Some of these are personal projects and others are professional/educational projects.
NAME: Name
PROJECTDESCRIPTION1: Studies project which the main goal was create a WebApp in Angular and a REST API in NET Core. The project is a social network for students and teachers. The project was developed in a team of 2 students during 6 weeks.
PROJECTDESCRIPTION2: Create a model of access control system with a RFID card and a digit code to enter using ESP32. A screen was over the access control systems to inform the user. There was a counting system using an MPTT server and a node.js for the admin interface.
